snippet.title: Enraged Red Ogre - Announcement Trailer - Nintendo Switch
snippet.description:
Enraged Red Ogre is a 2D adventure with lots of action and platforming, coming to Nintendo Switch™ in early fall 2023!

Join Akaoni, a grumpy red ogre with incredible strength, in a journey to stop the yokai menace while running, jumping and SMASHING with his trusty kanabō. Along the way he will met Blu, a small onibi that will help him in his adventure for selfish reasons, allowing Akaoni to use the elemental powers of his enemies!

Follow Akaoni Studio on Twitter: https://twitter.com/akaoni_jose
